DOC.brief_summary: This study assess ability AIN457 attenuate increase airway neutrophil see follow ozone exposure . Healthy subject treat AIN457 , placebo , oral corticosteroid response subsequent ozone exposure evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Effect AIN457 Ozone-induced Airway Neutrophilia Compared Placebo Corticosteroid Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy subject Normal sputum neutrophil level screen Ozone responsive Exclusion criterion : Smokers Prior treatment antibody treatment immunosuppressive agent Presence history major chronic inflammatory autoimmune disease History severe hypersensitivity biological agent ( antibody soluble receptor ) , history serious allergic reaction , collagen disease , neurological disease ( include demyelinate disease ) . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
